original_title: Government calls investors to sell stake in SLT
original_body_lines: The Ministry of Finance has called for requests for qualifications (RfQs) from potential investors for the divestiture of its shares in Sri Lanka Telecom PLC (SLT).
According to the State Owned Enterprises Restructuring Unit, the deadline for the submission of proposals ended at 02:00 p.m. today (12 Jan.)
